name: daniel-bytes.github.io
tagline: Thoughts on programming, audio and cats
body:
## Welcome!
Check out my tutorial on adding Monome support to a C++ application: 
- [serialosc_example](http://daniel-bytes.github.io/serialosc_example/).

If you are into developing VST plugins, check out some of my open source (work in progress) VST plugins:
- [beepbox](https://github.com/daniel-bytes/beepbox)
- [beat slider](https://github.com/daniel-bytes/beatslicer)

And maybe if you're a C# developer looking for Open Sound Control integration with your application, check out my OSC.net library:
- [OSC.Net](https://github.com/daniel-bytes/osc.net)

Finally, I have some browser-based audio applications.  These are a work in progress but might be interesting to check out as in-browser DSP gets better:
- [web-beats](https://github.com/daniel-bytes/web-beats)
- [skreweb](https://github.com/daniel-bytes/skreweb)
- [gr00v3](https://github.com/daniel-bytes/gr00v3)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
